doc:
Christian Meoli https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christian_Meoli 0 Christian Meoli (July 6, 1972 in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania) is an actor, writer, producer and film executive.Christian is the son of Jerry Mayo (1934–2011) bandmember of the group Freddie Bell and the Bellboys. He is married to Beverly Leech, an actress who is best known for her portrayal of Kate Monday on Square One TV's Mathnet and a stepfather to Kate Smeal. Christian_Meoli ( July_6_,_1972 in Philadelphia , Pennsylvania ) is an_actor_,_writer_,_producer_and_film_executive.Christian is the_son of Jerry_Mayo ( 1934 – 2011 ) bandmember of the_group_Freddie_Bell and the_Bellboys . He is_married to Beverly_Leech , an_actress who is_best_known for her_portrayal of Kate_Monday on Square_One_TV 's_Mathnet and a_stepfather to Kate_Smeal .
